body_html:
This is enough to get something like work language model to work with the expected annotations (and I expect what other RNN-like things will need as well). Luckily it seems like we are finding the the right trace eventhough it could find the one with an undefined input.

This is an easier story for alpha testers since they have a workaround if they encounter it that doesn't require modifying their whole program.

body:
This is enough to get something like work language model to work with the expected annotations (and I expect what other RNN-like things will need as well). Luckily it seems like we are finding the the right trace eventhough it could find the one with an undefined input.

This is an easier story for alpha testers since they have a workaround if they encounter it that doesn't require modifying their whole program.
